title: 109_hr2759
content: Equity in Fertility Coverage Act of 2005 - Amends the Public Health Service Act and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to require a group health plan, and a health insurance issuer offering group health insurance coverage, that provides coverage of impotency medications such as Viagra to also provide coverage of fertility treatments. Applies such requirements to coverage offered in the individual market and to coverage offered through the federal employees health benefit plan.
